name: Novelty
description:
A first person adventure\quest game, where you have to look for clues and solve intricate puzzles to unlock the end of the level. Hidden throughout the house, you will find notes & journals, alluding to the dark history of the house and its owners.

Story

You're gonna take the role of a real estate agent, whose task is to investigate the house in order to find out its condition before selling, as its owners have suddenly disappeared a long time ago, preceded by tragic series of events.

System requirements.

- Operating System: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
- Graphics card: Nvidia Geforce GT1030 | AMD Radeon RX 550 or better.
Integrated graphics: RX Vega 8 (Ryzen 3 2200G\Ryzen 5 2500U or better), Intel Xe graphics.

Post scriptum

I would really appreciate if you leave your feedback about the project - which gameplay elements are done good, which are bad or neutral, your overall impression and feelings about the game. Asking for your honest opinion and help :) I'm gonna analyze those and make some decisions about the upcoming improvements and the future of the project. Bug reports and just any comments are also welcome. Thank you and have fun!
